value.title: Microsoft Has Significant Monetization Opportunity From AI-driven Productivity: Analysts
value.excerpt: Mizuho analyst Gregg Moskowitz maintains Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) with a Buy and raises the price target from $300 to $315. value.title: Microsoft Open-Sources Weather Forecasting Deep Learning Model ClimaX
value.excerpt: Researchers from Microsoft's Autonomous Systems and Robotics Research group have open-sourced ClimaX, a deep learning foundation model for weather and climate modeling. ClimaX can be fine-tuned for a variety of prediction tasks and performs as well as or better than state-of-the-art models on several benchmarks.
